# Celerity (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* | [[Ehlonna]], [[Fharlanghn]], [[Olidammara]], Xan Yae, Zuoken |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Powers:** Your land speed is faster than the norm for your race by 10 feet. This benefit is lost if you are wearing medium or heavy armor or carrying a medium or heavy load.

**Celerity Domain Spells**

**1** **[[Expeditious Retreat (Spell)|Expeditious Retreat]]****:** Your speed increases by 30 ft.

**2** **[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|Cat’s Grace]]****:** Subject gains +4 to Dex for 1 minute/level.

**3** **[[Blur (Spell)|Blur]]****:** Attacks miss subject 20% of the time.

**4** **[[Haste (Spell)|Haste]]****:** One creature/level moves faster, +1 on attack rolls, AC, and Reflex saves.

**5** **[[Tree Stride (Spell)|Tree Stride]]****:** Step from one tree to another far away.

**6** **[[Wind Walk (Spell)|Wind Walk]]****:** You and your allies turn vaporous and travel fast.

**7** **[[Cat's Grace, Mass (Spell)|Cat’s Grace, Mass]]****:** As *[[Cat's Grace (Spell)|cat’s grace]]*, one subject/level.

**8** **[[Blink, Greater (Spell)|Blink, Greater]]****:** Controlled blinking between the Material and Ethereal Planes grants defenses for 1 round/level.

**9 [[Time Stop (Spell)|Time Stop]]:** You act freely for 1d4+1 rounds.


| **Source:** | Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 271 |
|---|---|
| | Complete Divine (WotC), pg. 137 |
